title: Mexican Coleslaw
directions: In a large mixing bowl, combine coleslaw mix, red pepper, black beans, grilled corn, cilantro, and jalape√±o.
In a separate small bowl, combine mayo, sour cream, taco seasoning, and lime juice.
Add mayo mixture to coleslaw mixture and stir to combine.
ingredients: 1/2 c. black beens rinsed and drained
1 jalapeno seeds removed and finely diced
